original_text: You would have had many descendants, as much as the sand on the shore of the sea. I would not need to destroy them. Their family name would continue for ever.’ You would have had many descendants, as much as the sand on the shore of the sea. I would not need to destroy them. Their family name would continue for ever.’ You would have had many descendants, as much as the sand on the shore of the sea. I would not need to destroy them. Their family name would continue for ever.’ You would have had many descendants,
korean_text: 네 자손이 모래 같았겠고 네 몸의 소생이 모래 알 같아서 그의 이름이 내 앞에서 끊어지지 아니하였겠고 없어지지 아니하였으리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: You would have had many descendants
as much as the sand on the shore of the sea
I would not need to destroy them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 파괴할 필요가 없었을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Their family name would continue for ever
